titles.title: Revising the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2006.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary: 7/21/2005--Introduced. Modifies the concurrent resolution on the budget for FY2006, with respect to major functional categories, to: (1) increase new budget authority and outlays for Veterans Benefits and Services; and (2) reduce such authority and outlays for International Affairs. Provides that such modifications shall have force and effect as though included in the resolution.
